definition: to weigh one's abilities and act accordingly/to act according to one's means/to cut one's coat according to one's cloth
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
to measure
surname Li
power/force/strength/ability/strenuously
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: Don's overstretch your start-up in times of family upheaval.
sentences.chinese: 在家庭遭受巨变时，创业要讲究量力而为。

sentences.english: Ability to be ahead of schedule owing on the loan, there is room for the hands of residents.
sentences.chinese: 提前还贷应量力而为，适合手中有闲钱的居民。

definition: to assess one's capabilities and act accordingly (idiom); to act within one's competence/One does what one can.
to stop before going too far (idiom); to stop while one can/don't overdo it/stop while you're ahead
to assess one's income and spend accordingly (idiom); to live within one's means/You can only spend what you earn.
think three times then go (idiom); don't act before you've thought it through carefully
to try one's utmost/to strive
think again and again before acting (idiom); consider carefully in advance
you must not/Please don't.../be sure not to/on no account (do it)
remember at all costs
to act with undue haste (idiom); eager and impatient/overhasty
lit. to want sth in haste, but cannot get there (idiom, from Analects); more haste, less speed/don't try to run before you can walk
to remember with reverence/to bear in mind/to keep in mind
too far is as bad as not enough (idiom, from the Analects)
everything
to bite off more than one can chew (idiom)/to aim too high
to save a little only to lose a lot (idiom)
to show off/to try to be brave
